tasks.title: Learn MongoDB
tasks.description: Study MongoDB, a NoSQL database, and understand its concepts such as collections, documents, and basic CRUD operations.

tasks.title: Master Express.js
tasks.description: Explore Express.js, the web application framework for Node.js. Learn to create routes, handle HTTP requests, and work with middleware.

tasks.title: Understand React.js
tasks.description: Dive into React.js, a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Explore components, JSX, state management, and component lifecycle.

tasks.title: Node.js Fundamentals
tasks.description: Gain a solid understanding of Node.js, the server-side JavaScript runtime. Learn about event-driven programming, asynchronous I/O, and the Node.js ecosystem.

tasks.title: Integrate MongoDB with Node.js
tasks.description: Learn how to connect MongoDB with Node.js using the official MongoDB Node.js driver. Implement CRUD operations and handle data within your Node.js application.

tasks.title: Build RESTful APIs with Express.js
tasks.description: Create RESTful APIs using Express.js. Define routes, handle requests, and implement CRUD functionality to interact with your MongoDB database.

tasks.title: Develop Single Page Applications (SPA) with React
tasks.description: Combine React with Express to build powerful Single Page Applications. Understand routing, state management, and asynchronous data fetching in React applications.

tasks.title: Learn MERN Stack Deployment
tasks.description: Explore deployment strategies for MERN stack applications. Understand hosting, server configuration, and deployment platforms like Heroku or AWS.

tasks.title: Testing in MERN Stack
tasks.description: Learn about testing practices in MERN stack development. Write unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for your MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js applications.
